name: The Mysterious Button-a Twine story
description: This is my first Twine story! I know so many other people have already done the "ominous button" concept but I had already gone too deep before realizing that. Try to get all 7 endings (I promise you can get all of them fairly easily). It's probably best to view this in fullscreen on a computer. Also, feel free to leave suggestions or tips in the comments! Have a great rest of your day, thanks for playing <3 --goose™
